Package org.apache.paimon.fileindex.bitmap

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BitmapFileIndexMeta.ThrowableConsumer
    functional interface.
    BitmapFileIndexMeta.ThrowableSupplier
    functional interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplyBitmapIndexFileRecordIterator
    A FileRecordIterator wraps a FileRecordIterator and BitmapIndexResult.
    ApplyBitmapIndexRecordReader
    A RecordReader which apply BitmapIndexResult to filter record.
    BitmapFileIndex
    The implementation of bitmap file index.
    BitmapFileIndexFactory
    Factory to create BitmapFileIndex.
    BitmapFileIndexMeta
    Bitmap file index format (V1) +-------------------------------------------------+----------------- | version (1 byte) | +-------------------------------------------------+ | row count (4 bytes int) | +-------------------------------------------------+ | non-null value bitmap number (4 bytes int) | +-------------------------------------------------+ | has null value (1 byte) | +-------------------------------------------------+ | null value offset (4 bytes if has null value) | HEAD +-------------------------------------------------+ | value 1 | offset 1 | +-------------------------------------------------+ | value 2 | offset 2 | +-------------------------------------------------+ | value 3 | offset 3 | +-------------------------------------------------+ | ...
    BitmapFileIndexMeta.Entry
    Bitmap entry.
    BitmapFileIndexMetaV2
    When the bitmap-indexed column cardinality is high, using the first version of the bitmap index format will take a lot of time to read the entire dictionary.
    BitmapIndexResult
    bitmap file index result.
    BitmapTypeVisitor<R>
    Simplified visitor for bitmap index.
